titleStmt.title: Some observations made upon the Cylonian plant Shewing its admirable virtues against deafness. Written by a physitian to the Honourable Esq; Boyle.
titleStmt.author: Mullins, James, physician.
Peachi, John, fl. 1683, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing (2nd ed.) to John Peachie [sic].
Formerly identified in Wing (1st ed.) as: M3060.
Copy cataloged has MS. annotation: "[James Mullins] has name in".
